comments:
Hi,

I am not able to run the debugger.  Eclipse is not showing the Theards and 
Monitors.  Always it says "Select a suspended Java VM to display its monitor 
information"  But none of the thread is visible on that window.

I am getting the following exception, if I try to run debugger second time.  
Looks its connecting my Remote Java Application on Port 7777, but not showing 
the threads and monitor.  If I try again then its says "Failed to connect to 
remote VM. Connection refused."

Any help on this will be greatly appreciated..

Exception:
!SESSION May 25, 2004 16:20:45.811 --------------------------------------------
-
java.version=1.4.2_03
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US

file:C:/eclipse2.1/eclipse/
!ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.ui 4 120 May 25, 2004 16:20:45.826
!MESSAGE Error logged from Debug UI:
